channel.description: Recent content in syntax on Morgan's Cyber Security Shed of Chaos

item.title: Mr Robot - Boot2Root CTF Walkthrough
item.description: Mr Robot CTF Walk-through Network Enumeration and Scanning Website Navigation CTF Flags Flag 1 Flag 2 Flag 3 Mr Robot CTF Walk-through Network Enumeration and Scanning The first we must do before we do anything we must scan the virtual network. Use arp-net to scan the virtual network. Then a list of the IP addresses should appear. One of the devices on the network should have “PCS Systemtechnik GmbH” as the vendor.
